reviewText: It for everyone that  has a kindle very easy to understand. and the person that is tell about it is very easy to understand just love it.

I bought a kindle and a kindle fire, over a year ago, still trying to figure them out, (No Manuals). Wife can finally work her kindle, my kinlde fire only shows a little window saying too many tabs open? I'm so P/O'd, can't get Amazon to help me, I'd send it back if I could. Paul McCloud
